!Trader Carson: Greetings, sir! Is there anything in particular you are looking for? Earrings, necklaces, rings and so forth... We have a wide selection of jewelry and accessories. Although we are located near the border with Elmore, the wealth of our city is most apparent here. We people of Aden people keep our elegant appearance no matter how dire the situation, wouldn't you agree? Well, take your pick. We have something for every budget!
